apiTitle: Terminate Agent - Clean Up Internal Records
description: Administrative endpoint that deletes internal tracking records for a terminated agent from MongoDB. This endpoint removes records from the invitations, partial-auth, and agent-reference collections. It does NOT delete actual relationships from EACD or terminate active agent-client relationships - it only cleans up internal housekeeping data. This is typically called as part of an agent termination workflow managed by other services.

responses.200: Successfully deleted internal records - returns JSON with deletion counts
responses.401: Unauthorized - invalid or missing HTTP Basic Authentication credentials
responses.500: Internal Server Error - MongoDB write exception occurred

authentication: HTTP Basic Authentication via withBasicAuth - not agent/stride authentication

The delete_record collection stores pending deletion tracking records
The relationship_copy_record collection tracks which legacy CESA relationships have been copied to EACD

Returns 200 OK with deletion counts even if 0 records were deleted
Uses EitherT for functional error handling - errors are propagated as Left values
